job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pActiveLogic Labs designs and develops custom webbased and mobile software applications for a myriad of different industries and in several different technologies Were looking for experienced and versatile software engineers who arent afraid of working as a team exploring new technologies and pushing their personal skills to their full potentialnbspppbrppstrongWhats in it for youstrongpulliSalary range 80k  130k Depending on skill amp experienceliliCompetitive total compensation packagenbspliliFull Benefits 50 of Medical premiums paid for by companyliliCompany paid Disability and Life insuranceliliFlexible schedule amp work locationliliLocally owned friendly fun atmosphereliulpbrppstrongTechnical Qualifications amp SkillsstrongppWere not worried about whether your experience is perfectly aligned with everything we use but more that you want to learn and bring your experience building solid applications Here are some of the things we doppbrppstrongFrontEnd Web TechstrongpulliCSSHTML SCSS WebpackliliBootstrapliliVueJSliliReactliliJavascript  JQueryliliAngularliulpbrppstrongBackEnd Web TechstrongpulliPHP  Laravel  SymphonyliliNET  CliliJavascript  NodeJS  ExpressliulpbrppstrongLowerLevel TechstrongpulliPythonliliC  CliliJavaliulpbrppstrongRequired Qualificationsstrongpulli3 Years of professional development experience School work does not countliliGIT Source Control Pull Requests Code ReviewsliliRelational Database Experience MySql SQL PostgresliliDependency Management Composer NPM Webpack Bowerliulpbrp
